aws:cdk:cloudformation:props.description: HQ Cloud API configuration secrets (dev). Contains: CLERK_SECRET_KEY, CLERK_JWT_KEY, MONGODB_URI, CLAUDE_CREDENTIALS_JSON
aws:cdk:cloudformation:props.name: hq-cloud/dev/api-config

aws:cdk:cloudformation:props.description: Builds HQ Cloud API and session-runtime Docker images
aws:cdk:cloudformation:props.name: hq-cloud-build-dev

aws:cdk:cloudformation:props.groupDescription: Security group for HQ worker Fargate tasks

securityGroupEgress.description: Allow all outbound traffic by default

aws:cdk:cloudformation:props.description: Task execution role for HQ worker containers
Task role for HQ worker application permissions

aws:cdk:cloudformation:props.groupDescription: Security group for HQ Cloud API ALB

securityGroupEgress.description: Allow all outbound traffic by default

aws:cdk:cloudformation:props.description: Execution role for HQ Cloud API task
Task role for HQ Cloud API application permissions

aws:cdk:cloudformation:props.groupDescription: Security group for HQ Cloud API ECS service

securityGroupEgress.description: Allow all outbound traffic by default
